attributes.action: Pay all front line NHS staff a tax free honorarium of £1,000 on 30 June 2021
attributes.additional_details: This pandemic has been particularly demanding for front line NHS staff exposing themselves to potential infection daily.  A tax free payment would demonstrate the nation's gratitude and help to motivate them through the difficult months to come.  It is a sufficiently large payment to enable them to purchase something tangible, or a brilliant experience
attributes.background: Add a £1,000 tax free payment to the monthly pay packet for June for all NHS front line staff to show the nation's gratitude for their commitment during the present crisis
